content: HDI+ / HDI Drop-in anchor High-performance tool-set drop in anchor ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Internally threaded anchor for applications in the medium load range Anchor, setting tool and Hilti drill bit form a matched tolerance system for more reliable fastening Compatible with the HDI-TE-CX automatic setting tool and stop drill bit system for highly productive and reliable fastening Applications Threaded rod hangers Plumbing Heating Ventilation and air-conditioning systems Suspended pipes ### TECHNICAL DATA: Environmental conditions: Dry indoor Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual), UL (Underwriter Laboratories) Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Technical Data | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual), UL (Underwriter Laboratories) | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Base materials | Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Concrete (uncracked) | PROFIS Software | No ### ITEMS- 409492 -
